attributes.action: provide funding for existing youth organisations that are solely concerened in helping young people to achieve their potential in life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a young person i have not always been on the straight and narrow, 

however when i got involved in my local youth group, i was able to truelly wise up, i was taught that as a young person i should not limit myself because i have the potential to achieve anything that i desire to achieve. such organisations really strive to bring out the best in young people and my request is that instead of wasting money on irrelevant schemes let us fund the ones that although not publicly noticed are the ones making a big difference especially in the lives of many young people. (mine included)
